summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Wallet 4 Jars fix and Savings Goals Page refactor. All P0 bugs are fixed: 1) Gifting Jar now displays correctly (4 jars visible), 2) New /savings-goals route works correctly, 3) Navigation from Dashboard and Wallet to /savings-goals works. All backend APIs tested and working.
passed_tests: ✅ GET /api/wallet - Returns all 4 wallet accounts (spending, savings, investing, gifting)
✅ POST /api/wallet/transfer - Transfer from spending to savings works
✅ POST /api/wallet/transfer - Transfer from savings to gifting works
✅ POST /api/child/savings-goals/{goal_id}/contribute - Adds money to goal from savings balance
✅ UI: Wallet page displays all 4 money jars (spending, savings, investing, gifting)
✅ UI: Gifting jar visible with correct styling and 'Give ₹' action button
✅ UI: Move Money button opens transfer dialog with all 4 jars in dropdowns
✅ UI: My Savings Goals link on Wallet page navigates to /savings-goals
✅ UI: My Goals button on Savings jar navigates to /savings-goals
✅ UI: Dashboard shows My Savings Goal card with active goals
✅ UI: New Goal button opens create goal dialog
✅ UI: Create savings goal from UI works
✅ UI: Add Money button on goal card opens allocate dialog
critical_code_review_comments: WalletPage.jsx: Correctly displays all 4 jars from wallet.accounts array with proper styling and action buttons
SavingsGoalsPage.jsx: Well-structured dedicated page with New Goal, Add to Goal, and Quick Transfer functionality
Dashboard.jsx: My Savings Goal card correctly links to /savings-goals instead of /wallet
App.js: /savings-goals route properly configured with ProtectedRoute wrapper
Backend server.py: All wallet and savings goals APIs working correctly with proper balance deductions
seed_data_creation: Created test user with 4 wallet accounts and session for testing. Test data cleaned up after testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: P0 bugs fixed: 1) Gifting Jar visibility bug - all 4 jars now display correctly on Wallet page and Dashboard. 2) Savings Goals Page refactor complete - new /savings-goals route works, navigation from Dashboard 'My Savings Goal' card and Wallet page 'My Goals' button both navigate to /savings-goals. Key data-testids: wallet-page, money-jars-grid, jar-spending, jar-savings, jar-investing, jar-gifting, savings-goals-link, move-money-btn, transfer-from-select, transfer-to-select, transfer-amount-input, transfer-submit-btn, dashboard-savings-goal, jar-savings-action. Backend APIs: GET /api/wallet (returns 4 accounts), POST /api/wallet/transfer, GET/POST /api/child/savings-goals, POST /api/child/savings-goals/{id}/contribute.
